description:
Dive into the world of 3D animation by creating a real life project: Create a realistic looking barrel that is often used in video game levels.

Using Autodesk's 3ds Max software, join professional game artist and animator Chad Walker for the essential 3D modeling and animation training for beginning game designers.

Course Structure

This course dives right in assuming you have a basic understanding of 3ds Max, but absolute beginner can easily follow along. You will start your design project from scratch by importing the needed assets, then learning 3D design and animation by seeing how you would apply this skill in real life.

Course Materials

Course files include the 3ds Max project files, as well as all the art and textures needed to complete this project.
title: Modelling a Barrel in 3ds Max
